title: Senior Business Analyst
description:
Position: Senior Business Analyst

Role: Business Analyst

Team: Business Intelligence

Location: Gurgaon




About Tata 1mg

Tata 1mg is a trusted health partner for end consumers and large institutions. Our mission is to make healthcare understandable, accessible, and affordable for all Indians. Over the past three years, we've worked to build a healthcare platform that guides customers to the right and affordable care. Today, Tata 1mg is present in 1000+ cities—and we’re just getting started. Leading the chart as one of the top consumer health platforms through ePharmacy, eDiagnostics, e-consult, and offline stores.




Tata 1mg has delivered over 15M ePharmacy orders, 2M eDiagnostics orders & 1M+ organic users/day in 2022 and we are just getting started. Our strongest asset is our 6400+ people, enabling us to deliver on our mission consistently.

Know more about us:https://www.1mg.com/aboutUs




Brief about the Team

Business Intelligence team works closely with the org-wide leadership team, business, product, growth, and category teams to drive operational excellence and strategic initiatives. The team works on special projects and innovations that aim to deliver high impact. The projects span across business verticals including e-pharma, e-diagnostics and retail.




What will you do:

Business strategy

Define business questions that need to be answered and participate/drive business planning
Define internal project’s scope, success metrics and drive project to execution highlighting the business impact.
Sound business judgment to effectively bridge the gap between analytics and business needs




2. Problem solving and analysis

Create mathematical models and generate business insights that streamline operations, drive revenue growth, and formulate strategies and modeling-led innovation
Solve real-world problems by building meaningful stakeholder relationships and developing domain expertise.
Define, manage and execute projects and individual tasks to meet short and long-term business goals
3. Communication
Communicate and advocate insights to relevant stakeholders to drive outcomes
Frequent updates to the leadership team, communicating business performance and insights that facilitate senior discussions and decision-making.




What we are looking for:

2+ years of experience in product/business analytics
Fluency in Microsoft Excel, SQL, and Python/R. Operational understanding of google analytics or any other product analysis tool
Strong sense of ownership and comfort in taking initiative and proactively offering business recommendations and enhancements through analysis of various data sources
Ability to translate complex analytics, insights, and outcomes into presentations to senior stakeholders in simple terms, demonstrating value to the business
Comfort with ambiguity: Translate business questions into analytical problems and build solutions using visualization techniques machine learning statistical modeling to ensure that the robust, scalable solution is developed

Why Join Us?

Tata 1mg provides one of the most exciting and high-growth environments to work. You get the added benefit of working in a prestigious legacy brand like Tata and a highly dynamic and versatile startup like 1mg. Being an integral part of the business intelligence will provide a great opportunity to scale up a business to great heights, leveraging the existing capabilities of Tata 1mg.
